channel.title: vite on CoreUI
channel.description: Recent content in vite on CoreUI

item.title: How to migrate CoreUI React Templates to Vite
item.description: After carefully considering and evaluating our build and development tools in version 5 of our React.js admin templates, we have decided to migrate from Create React App (CRA) to Vite. This decision was driven by several key factors that align with our goals for a more efficient and modern development experience.

item.title: How to Migrate from create-react-app to Vite?
item.description: In the evolving landscape of web development, keeping up with efficient tools and processes is crucial for any developer looking to enhance performance and maintainability. Vite has emerged as a natural successor to Create React App (CRA) for many looking to build modern, single-page React applications. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll walk through the steps to migrate your project from CRA to Vite, with a focus on practicality and ease.
